name: Avix Jam #3 / Underwater Torero
description:
In a future where hope was no more...

The human race was forced to live underwater.

Once they became used to 'new normal', new sports were created.

Among us, there was only ONE MAN brave enough to face certain death just to bring a few smiles and joy to its gente bella...

Quick tip! Use to move.

Made by Nico Castez & Paloma Arregui
during the 6 hours Avix Jam 3rd edition
